item.description:
Want to help spread the word about Cityscoots and the Greater Boston Scooter Club?

Meet us at the Diesel Cafe on Monday August 11th at 6PM, get a stack of cards then take to the streets on your own or in groups for an hour before meeting back for ice cream and to share your stories of what you saw and who you met in your travels.

Cards can be stuck on scooters or handed to scooterists to let them know about the club, there will be plenty of cards on hand so you can take more with you at the end of the night to pass out in your travels. Cards also available at all events after 8/12

Ice cream location TBD, got a place in mind, let me know!

Paul
item.name: Marketing ride, divide and conquer!
